name: Sleep Jumping (Mikill)
description:
Sleep Jumping is a 2D-platformer, where you DO NOT control the character. Instead, you place command-nodes which the character responds to, either by jumping, rotating or shooting. Guide the Sleeper safely to the bell in order to advance.

Controls:

  • Item slots = number keys on top of the alphanumeric keyboard
  • Cycling slots = R
  • Placing item = Left Mouse-Click
  • Pausing = P or Esc
